channel.title: Items
channel.description: Is it possible to add a item that raises your skill all the way up to 99? if so, guide please? :D

item.title: Items
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Of course you can, first of all you’re going to need the item code so you can actually execute the task that you want your server to do. this works for a 317 server.
Here’s an example:

(Make sure this is in your Case of (First Click Item!!!)

//Clicking this item will trigger your set skill event.
if (itemID == //ITEM CODE HERE) {
playerXP[SKILL ID HERE 0-20] = 0;
playerLevel[SKILL ID HERE 0-20] = 1;
setSkillLevel(SKILL ID HERE 0-20, playerLevel[99], playerXP[14000000]);
}

All you got to do is change the “Item Code Here” to your Item code that you want it to trigger with, and change “Skill ID Here 0-20” with the Skill ID

Skill Id’s -


Attack- 0
Strength- 2
Defence- 1
Hitpoints- 3
Prayer- 5
Range- 4
Magic- 6
Cooking- 7
Woodcutting- 8
Fletching- 9
Fishing- 10
Firemaking- 11
Crafing- 12
Smithing- 13
Mining- 14
Herb- 15
Agility- 16
Theiving- 17
Slayer- 18
Farming- 19
Runecrafting- 20

Read full topic
